description.str: RSS feed of announcements from the team behind Ceno Browser

title.str: Take a look at Ceno's two browsing modes: Public and Personal:

description.str: You can easily toggle between them. Public mode offers the best connectivity but the least privacy - websites that you visit or share are recorded in a publicly-accessible registry (BitTorrent). Personal mode eliminates this record but may be slower and less efficient at retrieving content. See the FAQ or User Manual for more details on Ceno usage.
